context.title: Basic Math
context.description: GeoCraft's Basic Math calculator performs general mathematical functions on horizons loaded into GeoCraft, such as exponentiation, and finding the absolute, maximum, minimum, or average value.

context.title: Boolean Algebra
context.description: GeoCraft's Boolean Algebra calculator performs Boolean Algebraic operations on horizons loaded into GeoCraft (for example: Equal Values, Intersecting Values, or Excluded Elements).

context.title: Scientific Calculations
context.description: Geomath's Scientific Calculator performs scientific calculations on horizons loaded into GeoCraft. For example, you can calculate the Arc Tangent, Cosine, or Base 10 Logarithm.
